SCHOOL OF THE ARTS AND ARCHITECTURE
SCHOOL OF THEATER, FILM AND TELEVISION
School of the Arts and Architecture
Welcome to the nexus of artistic inspiration, education and vision
UCLA School of the Arts and Architecture
, where students pursue their passions, master their crafts and rise to every occasion at one of the top arts schools in the nation.

Here, you will find an atmosphere that celebrates the creative process and a curriculum dedicated to the support and nurturing of dreams. Study with a star-studded faculty that includes visionaries like photographer Catherine Opie, architect Thom Mayne and digital pioneer Rebeca Méndez.
UCLA School of the Arts and Architecture
